contributionDescription: I like to hold the OP token and participate in every vote, I have been doing this since the moment I started working with the network. I am ready to contribute to your project, make reposts, put likes and communicate with the community both in Twitter and in Discord. I participated in Gitcoin Grants and contributed to projects there. I have done token delegation and am voting very responsibly in Optimism project.

contributionLinks.description: my token delegation proof and my statement

impactDescription: I vote in the project very responsibly, reading carefully all the news and changes. I believe that users like me are needed by the project, I am immersed here not only for the purpose of earning money. My contribution is valuable, as I work and study it from different angles. I have some visions of the future where the project can be a very significant sign for the time.
recategorizeReason: NO, it is not correctly categorized. The application is marked as a "PROJECT" but the applicant mentions "I" and "me", indicating an individual.
